thread.title: Major gun retailer ‘Dick’s’ ends sales of assault-style rifles

title: Major gun retailer ‘Dick’s’ ends sales of assault-style rifles
text:
Major gun retailer ‘Dick’s’ ends sales of assault-style rifles 6:15pm GMT - 01:32 
Dick’s Sporting Goods said it is ending sales of assault-style rifles and high-capacity magazines in its stores, on the same day students return to classes at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School. Jillian Kitchener reports.   
Dick’s Sporting Goods said it is ending sales of assault-style rifles and high-capacity magazines in its stores, on the same day students return to classes at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School. Jillian Kitchener reports.  //reut.rs/2CPzsJb
